aboutMe: Yvonne Njuguna is a professional dance instructor and founder of Yvanadanceempire. She trained in various dance styles including Classical ballet, modern tap, musical theatre, contemporary, hiphop, and afrobeat at Dance Centre Kenya. In 2022, she attained an Intermediate foundation ballet certificate from the Royal academy of dance. Yvonne worked as a dance instructor at various schools such as Msingi bora kindergarten, Braeside, French School, and Steppingstones before opening her brand, Yvana dance empire, in 2022. Currently, she teaches at Nairobi international school, Kigwa ridge school, and Waldorf School. She won a trophy and certificate in the happy feet dance festival that took place at the Nairobi international school on March 4, 2023.
